item.name: Update Email Template: Thank you for contacting us
Update Email Template: Thank you for Job Application

body.raw:
{
    "templateId": "registration-confirmation",
    "templateType": "highlight-text",
    "updatedBy": "cms-user-123456789", 
    "locale": "en-IN",
    "initiatorSystemCode": "DMS-CMS",
    "templateData": {
        "subject": "Welcome to ABC Portal, {{recipientName}}!",
        "content": "Dear {{recipientName}},

Welcome to ABC Platform!

We are delighted to have you join our community. Your registration has been successfully completed, and you can now access all the features and services that ABC Platform has to offer.

Your login email (username):

{{highlight}}

Here's what you can do next:

- **Explore Your Dashboard**: Log in to your account and familiarize yourself with the dashboard. You can manage your profile, schedule appointments, and access your medical records.
- **Book an Appointment**: Easily book appointments with our healthcare providers at your convenience. Visit the 'Appointments' section to get started.
- **Telemedicine Consultations**: Access telemedicine services for virtual consultations with our healthcare professionals from the comfort of your home.
- **Health Education Resources**: Check out our extensive library of health education materials to stay informed and empowered about your health.

If you have any questions or need assistance, our support team is here to help. Feel free to contact us at support@platformname.com or call us at +12345677899.

Thank you for choosing ABC Platform. We look forward to supporting your health and well-being.

Best regards,

The ABC Team

",
        "footerDetails": {
            "helpText": "Need help? Ask at [support@company.com](mailto:support@company.com) or or visit our [Help center](https://www.company.com/help)",
            "companyName": "ABS Solutions",
            "logo": "https://cms.company.com/uploads/thumbnail_logo_b9e62ace38.png",
            "copyright": "All rights reserved. Copyright @2024 Company",
            "address": "123 Address, City, State, USA - 123456",
            "socilalLinks": {
                "facebookUrl": "https://www.facebook.com/yourpage",
                "twitterUrl": "https://twitter.com/yourpage",
                "linkedinUrl": "https://www.linkedin.com/yourpage",
                "instagramUrl": "https://instagram.com/yourpage"
            }
        }
    }
}
